attributes.action: Remove fees charged on Health and Safety executive publications
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Health and safety executive has many priced publications available. These offer advice on complying with the law and in some cases, such as approved codes of practice, have legal significance. These publications should be available free of charge in order to assist small business to fully comply with their legal duties without incurring unnecessary expense.
